description: Given a database generated by scanning a substrate and a query, will select all flakes matching the given query and copy the corresponding image files into a specified directory for review.

spec.help: The directory containing the database file and the image files to be filtered.

The portion of a SQL query that comes after "SELECT file FROM flakes". The specified string will be appended to this query and the resulting image files written into the output directory with a number prepended to them, corresponding to their order in the response.
The directory to place the resulting image files into.
